item.title: About and Acknowledgments
item.description: ABOUT H-DOCS Attempting to combine the modern look of FOUR with the scope and variety of HardDrop, our predecessors, with our own twist of functionality and accessibility.

item.title: Custom Minimals
item.description: header{max-width: 700px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); padding: 0 2em;} body{display: flex; justify-content: center;} .singlePage{width: -webkit-fill-available; max-width: 700px;} .minimal-graphic{ display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; } @media all and (max-width: 600px){ .

item.title: Formatting
item.description: Generating Fumen Images Insert a fumen code into Rith’s custom <fumen> tags as you would in standard HTML. Images will be rendered in-site through JavaScript.

item.title: Fumen
item.description: header{max-width: 700px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); padding: 0 2em;} body{display: flex; justify-content: center;} .singlePage{width: -webkit-fill-available; max-width: 700px;} Fumen is a board editor made by knewjade.

item.title: Minimals
item.description: header{max-width: 700px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); padding: 0 2em;} body{display: flex; justify-content: center;} .singlePage{width: -webkit-fill-available; max-width: 700px;} .minimal-graphic{ display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; } .

item.title: Parameter: Patterns
item.description: header{max-width: 700px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); padding: 0 2em;} body{display: flex; justify-content: center;} .singlePage{width: -webkit-fill-available; max-width: 700px;} The –patterns parameter for [[sfinder-docs/solution-finder|solution-finder]] is one of the harder parameters to understand.

item.title: Path-Filter Minimals
item.description: header{max-width: 700px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); padding: 0 2em;} body{display: flex; justify-content: center;} .singlePage{width: -webkit-fill-available; max-width: 700px;} Path-Filter Minimals The output from this may be bigger than the smallest possible set, but the difference can be marginal (one or two solves) as a trade-off for being able to find small solution sets quickly for setups whose strict minimals can’t be found within a reasonable timeframe.

item.title: PC Resources
item.description: Practice Resources Perfect Clear Setup Finder PC Gang's Setup Konbini, a collection of almost everything related to perfect clear setups.

item.title: Perfect Clears
item.description: Here are setups for the various types of perfect clears. More to come later. Categories First PC Second PC 3rd DPC 4th 5th 6th Seventh PC 8th 9th

item.title: Solution Finder
item.description: header{max-width: 700px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); padding: 0 2em;} body{display: flex; justify-content: center;} .singlePage{width: -webkit-fill-available; max-width: 700px;} Solution Finder, often referred to as sfinder, is a program created by knewjade, who’s also responsible for various other tools.

item.title: Solution Finder: Cover
item.description: header{max-width: 700px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); padding: 0 2em;} body{display: flex; justify-content: center;} .singlePage{width: -webkit-fill-available; max-width: 700px;} Solution Finder’s Cover command outputs the probability of setting up/buidling a specified field (or multiple), given a specified pattern.

item.title: Solution Finder: Path
item.description: header{max-width: 700px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); padding: 0 2em;} body{display: flex; justify-content: center;} .singlePage{width: -webkit-fill-available; max-width: 700px;} [[sfinder-docs/solution-finder|Solution Finder]]’s Path command outputs all the ways to get a perfect clear from a specified field, given a specified pattern.

item.title: Solution Finder: Percent
item.description: header{max-width: 700px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); padding: 0 2em;} body{display: flex; justify-content: center;} .singlePage{width: -webkit-fill-available; max-width: 700px;} Solution Finder’s Percent command outputs the probability of getting a perfect clear from a specified field, given a specified pattern.

item.title: Terminals
